reuters.title: ITT <ITT>, ALCATEL SETTLE FINAL PAYMENTS
reuters.body: ITT Corp said it received a final 400 mln dlr payment for its telecommunications joint venture with <Alcatel NV>, settling all accounts in the venture. The company had previously said it was due to receive the 400 mln dlr payment. Alcatel NV was formed last year when ITT and <Cie Generale d'Electricite> of France merged their telecommunications business. ITT received a 37 pct interest in Alcatel and 1.3 billion dlrs in cash, including today's payment. Reuter 
